text: "I Left My Heart in San Francisco" is a 1962 song by Tony Bennett and is the title track to his album of the same name. It went to number 19 in the United States and it is his signature song. It won 2 Grammy Awards in 1963. It has since been covered by Bobby Womack. ==References== Category:1962 songs Category:Tony Bennett songs Category:Frank Sinatra songs Category:Jan & Dean songs Category:Bobby Womack songs Category:Westlife songs Category:Andy Williams songs
title: I Left My Heart in San Francisco
